3/5

100 hour experiment.

Requires heavy teamwork and coordination which you won't find easily but you might find the odd few games with semi-competent people and have a somewhat enjoyable experience if you're lucky. Weapons have unique firing patterns which you need to figure out and every map will have its own callouts so it's good to learn them.

Now onto the community, and oh boy, you're going to have an awful time as muting the particularly bad offenders will only make it more difficult to relay information between the team. Also you'll find most people won't listen, argue or otherwise berate people who aren't performing to their standard,
